definition: food made from dough of flour or meal and usually raised with yeast or baking powder and then baked, to cover with bread crumbs
details:
noun
- food made from dough of flour or meal and usually raised with yeast or baking powder and then baked
= synonyms: breadstuff
- informal terms for money
= synonyms: boodle
verb
- to cover with bread crumbs
= example: to cover with bread crumbs
